requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I'd be surprised if your pc can't run this

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I'd be surprised if your pc can't run this
